text: Several studies have indicated that a peptide spanning aa 2 - 120 of the C gene ( C22 ) is a major component of the commercially available second - generation anti - HCV tests . Our study demonstrates that the full - length core protein has better reactivity than C22 . It is possible that the C - terminal domain of the core protein contains key peptide sequences for constructing the viral particle and regulating viral assembly ( 4 , 20 ) .
